resp.Brief description: Report disconnection/connection times with minute accuracy to Datahub and process with minute accuracy.

resp.Feature name: Balance agreement and usage point status processing with minute accuracy
resp.Brief description: Determine the party whose balance the consumption goes to according to the balance agreement situation at the beginning of the time step (15 min or 1 h).
Further development of metering data reminders to support minute accuracy for disconnection/connection times.

resp.Feature name: Balance agreement validity in disconnection situation
resp.Brief description: Balance agreement remains valid until the end of the disconnection time step (15 min/1 h) at the moment of disconnection.

resp.Feature name: New attribute for exact disconnection/connection time
resp.Brief description: A new attribute is needed to handle the exact disconnection/connection time in Datahub.

resp.Feature name: Balance agreement creation in connection situation
resp.Brief description: Balance agreement is created from the beginning of the connection time step.

resp.Feature name: Alignment of calculation, point of use status, and balance agreements
resp.Brief description: Ensure that calculation, point of use status, and balance agreements are fully aligned with each other.

resp.Feature name: No changes required to metering information reminders
resp.Brief description: No changes are required to the metering information reminders in option B.

resp.Feature name: Possible changes to messages transmitted to the parties
resp.Brief description: Possible changes to the messages transmitted to the parties (e.g., DH-13x, DH-412/422) for connection/disconnection information.

resp.Feature name: Balance agreement situation checked every time step
resp.Brief description: The balance agreement situation is checked every time step frame.

resp.Feature name: Handling of balance agreements in same quarter disconnection/connection
resp.Brief description: Handle balance agreements to avoid overlap when disconnection and connection occur during the same 15 min.

resp.Feature name: Handling of balance agreements in same hour disconnection/connection
resp.Brief description: Handle balance agreements to avoid overlap when disconnection and connection occur during the same hour.
